titleStmt.title: Foure sermons vpon seuerall partes of scripture, preached by George Gyffard, preacher of the worde, at Maudlin in Essex
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Iudson, for Tobie Cooke, and Robert Walker,

notesStmt.note: Four sermons, each with caption title.
Some print show-through; some pages marked.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
